abstract: A castlelike five-story structure and a house with an ultramodern interior are two of the three remaining town houses on a historic block between 84th and 85th Streets.
snippet: A castlelike five-story structure and a house with an ultramodern interior are two of the three remaining town houses on a historic block between 84th and 85th Streets.
lead_paragraph: It is a historic moment on the block of Central Park West between 84th and 85th Streets.

headline.main: Big Deal | Gilded Then, Gilded Now
